title: Philly Bike Expo brings 110 cycling brands & builders together this weekend!
content:
Looking to get back in front of the brands and handmade custom bicycle builders? The 2021 Philly Bike Expo is taking place this Saturday and Sunday, November 6-7. With 110 exhibitors, lots of seminars, and thousands of visitors, it’s shaping up to be the East Coast’s comeback party. We’re featured several of the handmade bike

The post Philly Bike Expo brings 110 cycling brands & builders together this weekend! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
